attributes.action: stop cadburys shuting factory at sumerdale at keynsham bristol and loseing british jobs to poland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: stop loseing more british jobs to poland ,cadbury profts up 30%,95% of somerdale products eat in the uk.makeing it in poland to come back to uk 1200 miles, more carbon gases in the air. please help mr brown??????things made at sumerdale keynsham bristol,crunchie,mini eggs,caramel,frys turkish delight,picnic,double decker,frys cream,curly wurly,keep british jobs for my children and their children
